header.title: Data Analyst & Software Developer
header.description:
Hello, I am a Bachelor of Business Administration specializing in information technology and I live in Helsinki. 
 
I have over two years of work experience in software development, and I am currently working in the field of data analytics. Through data storytelling and visualization, I provide companies with data-driven insights and reports that help them organize resources more efficiently. With graphic design skills, I create clear and easy-to-read charts and presentations.

website.experience: Jere demonstrated a good visual eye as well as knowledge of user interface/user experience design. It was also easy to communicate with him. I had a clear vision of what I wanted. Jere implemented this as well as greatly improved it. Recommended!

projects.websites_information: All of these websites are responsive until 320px width.

project_data1.name: MAANG Stock Dashboard
project_data1.description: Dashboard that shows MAANG stock data. Report based on this data is also included.

project1.name: Finnish Map Quiz
project1.description: Website that tests users Finnish geography knowledge.

project2.name: Band Template
project2.description: Website template for a metal/rock/punk band.

project3.name: Guitar Dictionary
project3.description: On this website user can read and learn English and Finnish guitar terminology.

project4.name: Movie Quiz
project4.description: Movie Quiz is a web application that allows user to test their knowledge of movies.
